prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (massive barrel-chested alien warrior:1.3), tan wrinkled skin, giant white horseshoe mustache, fierce unwavering gaze, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: extreme muscle definition, visible pores and wrinkles on skin, hyperrealistic texture on the mustache strands, high quality fabric on uniform, sharp focus, source palette preservation, identical color matching
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, smooth skin, human skin tone, doll, flat lighting, low quality, (friendly expression:1.3), skinny, underdeveloped, (small mustache:1.2)
